meanings.definition: (verb) To turn a corner while driving or cycling.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys cornering around the neighborhood on her bike.
meanings.sent2: The car expertly navigated the sharp cornering on the race track.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was cornering around the tree trunk in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were cornering around the idea of starting a new hobby.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's graceful cornering across the stage captivated the audience.
